name: God Of Gods
storyline:
In the vast Metaverse, where virtual realities overlap, a powerful cosmic disruption occurs. The gods, once confined to mythical realms, emerge from their divine retreats, shattering the barriers that separated them from the virtual worlds. Their thirst for power drives them to conquer every corner of this digital universe.

The first to be affected are the science fiction worlds. Zeus, the king of the Greek gods, unleashes his army of lightning and thunder, sowing chaos in futuristic cities. Meanwhile, Ra, the Egyptian sun god, conjures scorching rays of light to reduce distant planets to ashes. Odin, the Norse god of war, gathers a horde of Viking warriors to plunder space colonies.
summary:
"God of Gods" is a strategy game created by passionate gamers for gamers, offering a gameplay experience reminiscent of Clash Royale. Customize your deck, evolve your characters, and collect unique skills to build a truly exceptional card collection.

Engage in thrilling PvP battles to climb the ladder and establish yourself as a top player, or test your skills in challenging PvE encounters against increasingly formidable opponents.
